console.log("Login Test: Teacher Access Token obtained and stored:", pm.environment.get("teacherAccessToken"));
console.warn(`Login Test: Unknown user_type '${userType}' in login response. Token not stored specifically.`);
pm.expect.fail(`Login Test: Unexpected user_type encountered: ${userType}`); // Fail the test if an unexpected user type is returned
// Optional: You might also store the current loggedInUserType if useful for later logic
pm.expect.fail("Login failed: access_token or user_type missing from response.");

console.log("Collection Pre-request: Generated Student Username:", pm.environment.get("studentUsername"));
console.log("Collection Pre-request: Generated Student Password:", pm.environment.get("studentPassword"));
const teacherUsername = `teacher_auto_${timestamp + 1}`; // Use timestamp + 1 to ensure distinctness from student if generated at same millisecond
const teacherPassword = `TeacherPass!${timestamp + 1}`; // Generate a strong, unique password
console.log("Collection Pre-request: Generated Teacher Username:", pm.environment.get("teacherUsername"));
console.log("Collection Pre-request: Generated Teacher Password:", pm.environment.get("teacherPassword"));
// --- Variables for shared Login request (will be set by setter requests) ---
// --- Variables for storing Access Tokens (initially empty) ---
// --- Variables for storing Profile IDs (initially empty) ---
